ModMetaData.name: RimTalk_GodsTongue
ModMetaData.author: juicy & chuanglusss
ModMetaData.description: Adds interaction effects to RimTalk conversations: - Talking to babies increases their play need. - Talking to toddlers (Toddlers Patch) gently increases play and reduces loneliness. This mod is a lightweight, optional add-on on top of RimTalk.
